content.json:
## Citrix WAF (Web App Firewall) Workbook
---

Gain insight into the Citrix WAF logs.

content.query:
union withsource=TableName CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Citrix"
| where DeviceProduct == "NetScaler"
| summarize Count=count() by Activity

union withsource=TableName CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Citrix"
| where DeviceProduct == "NetScaler"
| summarize Count=count() by DeviceAction

items.name: Distribution  of Action taken by Citrix WAF based on configuration
